REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0140 reute r f BC-MERCK-<MRK>-UPS-1987 03-09 0041

TEXT.TITLE: MERCK <MRK> UPS 1987 RESEARCH BUDGET 11 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Merck and Co Inc said it will spend more than 530 mln dlrs this year on research and development, up 11 pct from the 480 mln dlrs it spent in 1986 on research and development. Reuter
